name: Haegemonia: Legions of Iron
description: From the makers of the award-winning Imperium Galactica 1 and 2 games, discover a powerful space-opera like RTS game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Windows DirectSound compatible sound card Additional Notes: Windows compatible mouse and keyboard. Local multiplayer only. There are no servers.

reviews.review_text: I enjoyed playing this game, if you can fix the issues it have (lot of instructions here on steam)
